channel.title: Double drops for NPCs
channel.description:
Been wondering how to make it where NPCs drop 2 items at once, as an example a dragon would drop red dhide and dragon bones.
I know i've done this before, can't seem to remember how ^^
- Boring

item.title: Double drops for NPCs
item.dc:creator: @zez1ma_boy zez1ma boy
item.description:
@zez1ma_boy wrote:

Just put it on same percentage as a drop

Read full topic

item.title: Double drops for NPCs
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

here

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1038, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1040, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1042, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1044, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1046, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1048, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1050, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1053, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1055, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 222) { ItemHandler.addItem(1057, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

that will make it drop multiple items in npc handler
in one drop not random drops

heres when the monster died (monk is id 222)

monste10.jpg783×540

heres is what the monk dropped

drops10.jpg784×537

Read full topic

item.title: Double drops for NPCs
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Just add two of these things:

ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomItem(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

in the NpcHandler.java, under the npc Id #.

Read full topic
